original_title: Maggie Simpson in "The Force Awakens from Its Nap"
overview: In a daycare far, far awayâ€¦ but still in Springfield, Maggie is on an epic quest for her stolen pacifier. Her adventure brings her face-to-face with young Padawans, Sith Lords, familiar droids, Rebel scum, and an ultimate battle against the dark side, in this original short celebrating the Star Wars galaxy.
title: Maggie Simpson in "The Force Awakens from Its Nap"
